amendment.description: An amendment numbered 191 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit any funds from being used to issue a license pursuant to any Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) memo regarding section 5.1.1 of Annex II to the JCPOA, including the OFAC memo titled, "Statement of Licensing Policy For Activities Related to the Export Or Re-Export to Iran of Commercial Passenger Aircraft and Related Parts and Services" and any other OFAC memo of the same substance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A159) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A159) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A159) offered by Mr. Roskam.
